title: 13,000 MikroTik Routers Hijacked by Botnet for Malspam and Cyberattacks
description: A global network of about 13,000 hijacked Mikrotik routers has been employed as a botnet to propagate malware via spam campaigns, the latest addition to a list of botnets powered by MikroTik devices.
